title: Sajith willing to be PM if President resigns
body_lines: Leader of Opposition Sajith Premadasa is willing to take over the premiership if President Gotabaya Rajapaksa resigns from his post, Chief Opposition Whip Lakshman Kiriella said today.
“ Mr. Premadasa is not willing to become a scarecrow Prime Minister,” he told journalists today.
“Why should we need a non-political Prime minister when there are people in SJB?” he questioned. (Yohan Perera)
